name: Chicken Fajitas (with Salad Option)
ingredients: Sliced or chopped green, red, and/or yellow peppers
Shredded or chopped iceberg lettuce (for salad option)
Mexican hot sauce or salsa of your choice

instructions.en: Marinate the chicken in fajita marinade for several hours or overnight; drain marinade before cooking.
Grill the chicken just until done; don't overcook.
Meanwhile, sauté the peppers and onions in oil until desired tenderness; season with salt to taste.

For fajita salad: Arrange a bed of lettuce on each plate. Thinly slice the chicken breasts and divide among the plates. Top with cheese, sauteed peppers and onions, salsa, sour cream, and guacamole if desired. Toss all together.
For traditional fajitas: Arrange the sliced chicken on a plate. Top with the pepper-onion mixture, cheese, salsa, guacamole, and sour cream.

notes: * Use Figaro Fabulosa Fajitas Marinade or similar. 1/2 bottle will marinate 4-6 breasts. This recipe is for one serving. Do not freeze.

variations.name: Fajita Salad
ingredients: 2 ounces iceberg lettuce, chopped, about 1 cup
